item.title: 习近平敦促马克龙帮助中国避免 "新冷战
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平呼吁法国帮助抵御 "新冷战"，因为欧盟日益与美国在安全风险和贸易紧张局势方面的担忧保持一致。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping called on France to help fend off a “new Cold War” as the European Union increasingly aligns with US concerns over security risks and trade tensions.】

item.title: 资金捉襟见肘的新购房者正在与 "翻新房 "划清界限
item.description: 对于试图进入艰难的美国房地产市场的购房者来说，似乎可以松一口气了：新挂牌房源正在增加。【原文：For homebuyers trying to crack into a tough US housing market, it would seem like relief is here: New listings are on the rise.】

item.title: 第一量子公司寻求与巴拿马穆利诺公司就已关闭矿山进行谈判
item.description: 第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd.）将寻求与巴拿马即将上任的总统举行会谈，努力解决导致巴拿马科布雷铜矿关闭的争端。【原文：First Quantum Minerals Ltd. will seek talks with Panama’s incoming president in an effort to resolve the dispute that shuttered the Cobre Panama copper mine.】

item.title: 灰度比特币信托基金迎来美国 ETF 获批以来的首次资金流入
item.description: 自 1 月份美国允许交易所交易基金持有数字资产以来，全球最大的加密货币投资工具首次出现投资者资金净流入。【原文：The world’s largest cryptocurrency investment vehicle saw a net inflow of investor money for the first time since US exchange-traded funds holding the digital asset were allowed in January.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔金称高利率的全面影响尚未到来
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长托马斯-巴尔金（Thomas Barkin）表示，他预计高利率将进一步减缓经济增长，并使通胀率降至央行设定的 2% 的目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Thomas Barkin said he expects high interest rates to slow the economy further and cool inflation to the central bank’s 2% target.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将转换年度预算以反映新货币
item.description: 津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）表示，津巴布韦将把其年度预算转换为黄金支持货币 ZiG，该货币已于上个月开始流通。【原文：Zimbabwe will convert its annual budget to its gold-backed currency, the ZiG, which went into circulation last month, Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube said.】

item.title: 习近平敦促马克龙帮助中国避免 "新冷战
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平呼吁法国帮助抵御 "新冷战"，因为欧盟日益与美国在廉价进口和国家安全风险方面的担忧保持一致。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping called on France to help fend off a “new Cold War” as the European Union increasingly aligns with US concerns over cheap imports and national security risks.】

item.title: JLL 称人工智能需求使数据中心成为 "最热门资产类别
item.description: 仲量联行（Jones Lang LaSalle Inc. 的首席执行官表示，随着美国企业拥抱人工智能，对数据中心的需求急剧上升，这在面临写字楼空置率上升的商业地产市场上创造了一个难得的亮点。【原文：Jones Lang LaSalle Inc.’s chief executive officer said demand is soaring for data centers as corporate America embraces artificial intelligence, creating a rare bright spot in a commercial-property market faced with rising office vacancies.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰即将达成收购 Linden Capital Partners 股份的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc.’s arm that invests in other alternative-asset managers is nearing a deal to acquire a minority stake in health-care-focused private equity firm Linden Capital Partners, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街银行为地铁三明治连锁店交易寻找买家
item.description: 据知情人士透露，银行正开始为罗克资本集团（Roark Capital Group）对三明治连锁店 Subway 的杠杆收购融资寻找投资者，这笔债券交易可能是同类交易中规模最大的一笔。【原文：Banks are starting to sound out investors for a financing that will pay for Roark Capital Group’s leveraged buyout of sandwich chain Subway in a bond deal that could be among the largest of its kind, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 刚果与中国的 70 亿美元交易与新合同规定的铜价有关
item.description: 根据最新公布的一份合同，刚果民主共和国与中国之间的一项矿产换基础设施交易将向这个中非国家提供数十亿美元的资金，而这项交易的重启将取决于铜价。【原文：A revamped minerals-for-infrastructure deal between the Democratic Republic of Congo and China that will send billions of dollars in financing to the Central African nation is contingent on the price of copper, according to a newly published contract.】

item.title: 国债保持上周升势
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师预测，国债市场将继续上涨，创下今年最大单周涨幅。【原文：The Treasury market built upon its biggest weekly advance of the year as Morgan Stanley strategists predicted additional gains.】

item.title: 埃克森首席执行官伍兹称雪佛龙仲裁将持续到 2025 年
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）预计，由于该案对两家公司的重要性，与雪佛龙公司就圭亚那一项重要资产的仲裁将持续到 2025 年。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. Chief Executive Officer Darren Woods foresees arbitration with Chevron Corp. over a premier Guyanese asset stretching into 2025 due to the importance of the case to both companies.】

item.title: 南非衍生品市场将开始使用新参考汇率
item.description: 南非的衍生品市场今年将开始使用央行新的兰特货币市场基准来为短期贷款定价。【原文：South Africa’s derivatives market will begin using the central bank’s new rand money-market benchmark to price short-term loans this year.】

item.title: Nickel 28 因创始人否认的 "严重不当行为 "解雇创始人
item.description: 镍28资本公司（Nickel 28 Capital Corp.）表示，在调查发现 "严重不当行为 "后，该公司已解雇了包括首席执行官安东尼-米勒夫斯基（Anthony Milewski）在内的公司创始人；被解雇的管理团队称这些指控不属实，是这家加拿大矿业公司长达数年的控制权之争的一部分。【原文：Nickel 28 Capital Corp. said it has fired its founders, including Chief Executive Officer Anthony Milewski, after an investigation uncovered “serious misconduct” — claims the ousted management team says are untrue and part of a years-long battle for control at the Canadian mining firm.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称买入债券押注通胀回落
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）在美国政府债券遭遇今年以来最严重的月度下跌之后，敦促投资者抢购美国政府债券。【原文：On the heels of their worst monthly rout this year, Morgan Stanley is urging investors to snap up US government bonds.】

item.title: 可可延续上周跌势，假日交易清淡
item.description: 由于伦敦银行假日期间交易量放缓，纽约可可期货周一下跌，延续了上周的大幅跌势。【原文：Cocoa futures in New York fell Monday, extending last week’s steep declines, as trading volume slowed during the London bank holiday.】

item.title: 米尔肯研究所全球会议的最新情况
item.description: 2022 年米尔肯研究所全球会议期间，发言人参加小组讨论。摄影师：Lauren Justice/Bloomberg【原文：Speakers participate in a panel discussion during the 2022 Milken Institute Global Conference. Photographer: Lauren Justice/Bloomberg】

item.title: 巴拿马债券大涨，交易商欢呼穆利诺的亲商立场
item.description: 在何塞-劳尔-穆利诺赢得总统大选并在胜选演说中承诺建立一个 "支持私营企业 "的政府之后，巴拿马政府债券周一成为拉丁美洲涨幅最大的债券。【原文：Panama’s government bonds were the biggest gainers in Latin America on Monday after Jose Raul Mulino won the presidential election and pledged a “pro-private enterprise” government in his victory speech.】

item.title: 学院证券》的彼得-奇尔说，美国的 "例外论 "开始显得陈旧了
item.description:
他说，也许我们错过了这一转变，因为 "我们太专注于通货膨胀和美联储"

。【原文：

Perhaps we’re missing the shift, he says, because ‘we’ve just been so fixated on inflation and the Fed’

】

item.title: 投资者对南非大选过于悲观，九零一公司称
item.description: 南非最大投资公司的一位基金经理认为，如果执政党非洲人国民大会在本月选举中未能获得全国多数席位，那么它在选举后与左派政党联合的可能性很低。【原文：A fund manager at South Africa’s largest investment firm believes there’s a low probability that the ruling African National Congress will coalesce with leftist parties after this month’s elections should it fail to get a national majority.】

item.title: Whataburger 通过 27 亿美元交易重返贷款市场
item.description: 德克萨斯州汉堡连锁店 Whataburger 将重返债市，以降低现有杠杆贷款的借贷成本，并赎回资产负债表上剩余的优先股，从而完成今年早些时候开始的一项交易。【原文：Texas burger chain Whataburger is returning to the debt market to cut borrowing costs on its existing leveraged loan and redeem the remaining preferred equity on its balance sheet, finishing a transaction it started earlier this year.】

item.title: 在 Adnoc 放弃股权谈判后，Braskem 业绩下滑
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：Braskem SA tumbled 25% in US premarket trading after disclosing that Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. is no longer pursuing a stake in the Brazilian petrochemicals producer.】

item.title: DM 称壳牌确认有意退出南非业务
item.description: 据《特立独行日报》报道，壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）打算退出其在南非的零售、运输和炼油业务股权。【原文：Shell Plc intends to exit shareholdings in its South African retail, transport and refining operations, Daily Maverick reported.】

item.title: 达斯表示，印度中央银行将提供离线数字货币
item.description: 印度储备银行行长沙克提坎塔-达斯（Shaktikanta Das）表示，印度储备银行正在努力使其数字货币无需依赖互联网接入即可使用。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India is working to make its digital currency available without being dependent on internet access, according to Governor Shaktikanta Das.】

item.title: 欧洲央行辛库斯预计今年将降息三次
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，他认为借贷成本将在2024年降低三次，并将从6月份的计划开始。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus said he sees borrowing costs being reduced three times in 2024 — starting with the planned move in June.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德收购私人债务公司 Castlelake 的费用股份
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）与卡斯尔莱克公司（Castlelake LP）建立了合作伙伴关系，获得了这家私人债务公司与收费相关的收益的大部分份额，这是该加拿大投资巨头努力发展信贷业务的又一举措。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management struck a partnership with Castlelake LP to get a majority share of the private debt firm’s fee-related earnings, another move in the Canadian investing giant’s effort to grow its credit business.】

item.title: 俄罗斯预算获得的石油收入是一年前的两倍
item.description: 尽管国际制裁旨在限制资金流向，以助长弗拉基米尔-普京总统的乌克兰战争，但俄罗斯 4 月份的石油收入仍比去年同期翻了一番多。【原文：Russia’s oil revenue more than doubled in April from a year earlier, despite international sanctions intended to limit the flow of money to fuel President Vladimir Putin’s war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金在潜在降息前看涨消费股
item.description: 随着最新经济数据和美联储言论重燃降息押注，对冲基金正在扭转对消费类股票的看跌立场。【原文：Hedge funds are reversing their bearish stance on consumer stocks as the latest economic data and comments from the Federal Reserve revive bets on interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 加拿大年轻人感觉更穷，这是对经济和特鲁多的警示信号
item.description: 加拿大人对个人财务状况感到悲观，而 Z 世代是最悲观的一代。【原文：Canadians are feeling gloomy about their personal finances — and Generation Z is the gloomiest of all.】
